DOC.HEADLINE: TENNIS ROUNDUP ; AGASSI NO . 2 AFTER PARIS VICTORY
DOC.TEXT: Andre Agassi won the $ 2.2-million Paris Open on Sunday with a 6-3 , 6-3 , 4-6 , 7-5 victory over Marc Rosset of Switzerland and moved to No . 2 in the world rankings . " The best thing is to win Grand_Slam tournaments , " said Agassi , the 1992 Wimbledon and 1994 U.S. Open champion. " Hopefully , some day you can say , ' Yeah , I was No . 1 for a while or for this long. ' But to win the Grand_Slam tournaments is what is most important to me. " * Katarina Maleeva of Bulgaria won her first tournament in three years when she defeated Brenda Schultz of the_Netherlands , 6-3 , 6-3 , in the final of the Bell Challenge in Quebec_City . * Alberto Berasategui of Spain defeated countryman Francisco Clavet , 6-4 , 6-0 , to win the Topper Open in Montevideo , Uruguay . * USC ' s Brett Hansen defeated Roger Pettersson of Nevada Las Vegas , 2-6 , 6-3 , 6-1 , for the championship of the Rolex-ITA Regional at UC Irvine .
